snippet: Pittsburgh had won all of its shootouts this season, but the Rangers managed to inflict a rare loss in a tiebreaker.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers beat Pittsburgh Penguins, 4-3, in shootout; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: Pittsburgh had won all of its shootouts this season, but the Rangers managed to inflict a rare loss in a tiebreaker.

headline.main: Rangers Defeat Penguins in Shootout; Devils Win in Overtime
headline.print_headline: Rangers Defeat Penguins in Shootout; Devils Win in Overtime
